description:
BLOCKBUSTER aims to provide solution to existing online gambling industry’s problems in lack of transparency, fairness and security with blockchain-based drawing algorithm that utilizes extracted hash values from live blockchain.
Well known as top-tier quality project in Korea, BLOCKBUSTER structured token economy that protects the token value exceptionally well.

70% of the profit earned by the platform will be used for buying back and burning the BBX tokens from the market, which will gradually decrease the circulation of token in the market.
name: BLOCKBUSTER
